title: Vegas Font Lookalikes?
content:
Hey everybody! I am looking for a font similar to this but free. Anyone know of one? Also any other Iconic vegas fonts would be a great help! Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140605020524im_/http:/typophile.com/files/getimage_4771.php.gif)
author: a.zuccs

comments.content:
_... but free_

Browse dafont and abstractfonts.
You won't find anything near House Industries quality for free.
